To sample both common and rare variants (minor allele frequency (MAF) ≥ 0.01 and MAF < 0.01, respectively), we imputed the discovery datasets by using a 1,000 Genomes reference panel consisting of 36,648,992 single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs), 1,380,736 insertions/deletions, and 13,805 structural variants.
